item.title: The 50 Best Shows on HBO Max Right Now (November 2025)
item.description: It: Welcome to Derry, The Chair Company, and Task are just a few of the shows you need to be watching on HBO Max this month.

item.title: One of Our Favorite Pairs of Binoculars Is $80 Off
item.description: These lightweight Celestron binoculars offer great magnification for the price.

item.title: The Oppo Find X9 Pro Has a Crazy-Long Detachable Zoom Lens
item.description: The new Find X9 Pro has a built-in 200-megapixel telephoto lens, but you can get even closer with a hefty Hasselblad zoom lens.

item.title: Hurricane Melissa Has Meteorologists Terrified
item.description: The storm, which is set to make landfall in Jamaica on Tuesday, has stunned meteorologists with its intensity and the speed at which it built.
